name: Supermarket Duck Dash
description:
Supermarket Duck Dash is a funny physics based shopping game where you control a duck to do the shopping for old people in a supermarket. However, the duck only has wings to try and get the products from the shelves and into the shopping cart.

Featuring 3 Different Game Modes

  • Arcade - Do the shopping for as many old people before the time runs out.
  • Speed Dash - You have one go to try and get as many things into your cart to get highest receipt vale as possible!
  • Destruction - Try and knock as many products off the shelves as possible before the time runs out!

Quack!

Featuring:
  • 125 different products to knock off the shelves
  • Crazy physics
  • 3 quack buttons to communicate your triumphs and frustrations in duck language
  • Large fruit!
  • Spotty teenagers and grumpy old people

You'll spend hours causing destruction in the supermarket trying to beat your own score!



How much money can you make before you run out of time?



A special thanks to my Kickstarter supporters such as Paul Lanois for their support in bringing this game out!
